title: Tielle sétoise (squid and tomato pie)
description: French pastry filled with squid cooked slowly in tomatoes and white wine – a simple, yet sophisticated, treat.(This recipe makes more pastry than you will need. The extra can be kept in the fridge for up to a week.)
ingredients: 250g/9oz cold unsalted butter, cubed and left to soften slightly
1 small squid (500g/1lb 2oz), cleaned, tentacles reserved and squid sliced into thin rings
500g/1lb 2oz tomatoes, blanched and refreshed, skin and seeds removed, flesh roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ bunch fresh mint, leaves picked
